Uses of Class
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron

Packages that use Neuron
Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.initializers
Defines the neural network initialization algorithms
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)

    Subclasses of Neuron in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ActivationsCachedNeuron
    A Neuron that caches activations for later retrieval.
    class 
    InputNeuron
    Represents an input neuron in a neural network.
    class 
    LastInputStoredNeuron
    A specialized Neuron that remembers the input values from its most recent activation.
